title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, I am encountering an issue. It appears that there is no declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Additionally, I do not understand the meaning of the error message.
OB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, I encounter the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects.
SR: Please provide a clear explanation of the meaning of the error message.
